checks.name: mimetype-file-present
checks.description: The OCF zip container must include a mimetype file as the first entry

checks.name: mimetype-file-first-entry
checks.description: The mimetype file must be the first entry in the zip archive

checks.name: mimetype-file-content
checks.description: The mimetype file must contain exactly 'application/epub+zip' with no whitespace

checks.name: mimetype-no-extra-field
checks.description: The mimetype zip entry must not have an extra field in its local header

checks.name: mimetype-stored-not-compressed
checks.description: The mimetype file must be stored (not compressed) in the zip archive
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag compressed mimetype entries

checks.name: container-xml-present
checks.description: META-INF/container.xml must be present in the OCF container

checks.name: container-xml-well-formed
checks.description: META-INF/container.xml must be well-formed XML

checks.name: container-has-rootfile
checks.description: container.xml must contain at least one rootfile element with media-type application/oebps-package+xml

checks.name: container-rootfile-exists
checks.description: The rootfile full-path must point to an existing OPF file in the container

checks.name: metadata-dc-title-present
checks.description: The package document metadata must include a dc:title element

checks.name: metadata-dc-identifier-present
checks.description: The package document metadata must include a dc:identifier element

checks.name: metadata-dc-language-present
checks.description: The package document metadata must include a dc:language element

checks.name: metadata-dcterms-modified-present
checks.description: The package document metadata must include exactly one dcterms:modified meta element

checks.name: manifest-unique-ids
checks.description: All manifest item id attributes must be unique
checks.epubcheck_note: Reported as schema error; originally predicted OPF-074

checks.name: manifest-item-href-required
checks.description: Each manifest item must have an href attribute

checks.name: manifest-item-media-type-required
checks.description: Each manifest item must have a media-type attribute

checks.name: unique-identifier-resolves
checks.description: The package unique-identifier attribute must reference an existing dc:identifier id

checks.name: spine-idref-resolves
checks.description: Each spine itemref idref must reference an existing manifest item

checks.name: spine-not-empty
checks.description: The spine must contain at least one itemref element

checks.name: opf-well-formed-xml
checks.description: The package document (OPF) must be well-formed XML

checks.name: metadata-element-present
checks.description: The package document must contain a metadata element

checks.name: manifest-element-present
checks.description: The package document must contain a manifest element

checks.name: spine-element-present
checks.description: The package document must contain a spine element

checks.name: package-version-valid
checks.description: The package version attribute must be a supported version (2.0 or 3.0)

checks.name: manifest-unique-hrefs
checks.description: All manifest item href attributes must be unique

checks.name: spine-unique-idrefs
checks.description: Each manifest item should appear at most once in the spine

checks.name: manifest-item-id-required
checks.description: Each manifest item must have an id attribute

checks.name: dcterms-modified-valid-format
checks.description: The dcterms:modified value must be a valid CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ date

checks.name: dc-language-valid-bcp47
checks.description: The dc:language value must be a well-formed BCP 47 language tag

checks.name: manifest-fallback-exists
checks.description: The fallback attribute must reference an existing manifest item

checks.name: manifest-fallback-no-cycle
checks.description: Fallback chains must not contain circular references

checks.name: spine-item-is-content-doc
checks.description: Spine items with non-standard media types must have a fallback to a content document

checks.name: manifest-media-type-matches
checks.description: The declared media-type must match the actual file content type

checks.name: cover-image-is-image
checks.description: The cover-image property must be assigned to a manifest item with an image media type

checks.name: single-nav-item
checks.description: Exactly one manifest item must declare the nav property

checks.name: manifest-file-exists
checks.description: Every file referenced in the manifest must exist in the container

checks.name: file-in-manifest
checks.description: Every content file in the container should be listed in the manifest
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag unreferenced files at ERROR/WARNING level

checks.name: fragment-id-resolves
checks.description: Fragment identifiers in hyperlinks must resolve to valid targets in the referenced document

checks.name: no-remote-resources
checks.description: Remote resource references are not allowed except for specific media types with declared properties

checks.name: css-file-exists
checks.description: CSS files declared in the manifest must exist in the container

checks.name: resource-in-manifest
checks.description: Resources referenced in content documents must be declared in the OPF manifest

checks.name: referenced-resource-exists
checks.description: Resources referenced in content documents (images, etc.) must exist in the container
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck uses RSC-001 for missing manifest-referenced files

checks.name: no-remote-stylesheet
checks.description: Remote CSS stylesheet references are not allowed in EPUB content documents

checks.name: font-file-exists
checks.description: Font files declared in the manifest must exist in the container

checks.name: nav-document-declared
checks.description: Exactly one manifest item must have properties='nav'

checks.name: nav-has-toc
checks.description: The navigation document must contain a nav element with epub:type='toc'

checks.name: nav-toc-links-resolve
checks.description: TOC navigation links must reference existing resources in the container

checks.name: nav-link-has-text
checks.description: Anchors within nav elements must contain text content

checks.name: nav-single-toc
checks.description: The navigation document must contain exactly one nav element with epub:type='toc'

checks.name: nav-landmarks-links-resolve
checks.description: Landmarks navigation links must reference existing resources

checks.name: nav-page-list-links-resolve
checks.description: Page-list navigation links must reference existing resources

checks.name: content-well-formed-xml
checks.description: XHTML content documents must be well-formed XML

checks.name: content-has-title
checks.description: XHTML content documents should have a title element in the head
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck reports this as WARNING, not ERROR

checks.name: href-not-empty
checks.description: Hyperlink href attributes must not be empty
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag empty href attributes

checks.name: no-obsolete-elements
checks.description: Content documents must not use obsolete HTML elements (e.g., center, font)

checks.name: scripted-property-declared
checks.description: Scripted content documents must declare the scripted property in the manifest

checks.name: svg-property-declared
checks.description: Content documents with inline SVG must declare the svg property in the manifest

checks.name: mathml-property-declared
checks.description: Content documents with MathML must declare the mathml property in the manifest

checks.name: hyperlink-resource-exists
checks.description: Hyperlink references in content documents must resolve to existing resources
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck uses RSC-007 for hyperlink references in content documents

checks.name: base-element-not-allowed
checks.description: The base element should not be used in EPUB content documents
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag base elements in content documents

checks.name: doctype-valid
checks.description: EPUB 3 content documents must use the HTML5 DOCTYPE or no DOCTYPE

checks.name: xhtml-namespace-correct
checks.description: The html element must use the XHTML namespace

checks.name: fxl-viewport-present
checks.description: Fixed-layout content documents must have a viewport meta element

checks.name: fxl-viewport-valid
checks.description: Fixed-layout viewport meta must specify both width and height dimensions

checks.name: epub2-ncx-present
checks.description: EPUB 2 publications must include an NCX navigation file

checks.name: epub2-ncx-well-formed
checks.description: The NCX navigation document must be well-formed XML

checks.name: epub2-ncx-has-navmap
checks.description: The NCX document must contain a navMap element

checks.name: epub2-spine-toc-attribute
checks.description: EPUB 2 spine element must have a toc attribute referencing the NCX manifest item

checks.name: package-unique-identifier-attr-present
checks.description: The package element must have a unique-identifier attribute

checks.name: dcterms-modified-exactly-once
checks.description: The dcterms:modified meta element must occur exactly once in EPUB 3

checks.name: manifest-property-valid
checks.description: Manifest item properties must be valid defined property values

checks.name: manifest-href-not-empty
checks.description: Manifest item href must not be empty or reference the package document itself

checks.name: dc-identifier-not-empty
checks.description: The dc:identifier element must contain a non-empty value

checks.name: dc-title-not-empty
checks.description: The dc:title element must contain a non-empty value

checks.name: manifest-href-no-fragment
checks.description: Manifest item href must not contain a fragment identifier

checks.name: package-dir-valid
checks.description: The package dir attribute must be 'ltr', 'rtl', or 'auto'

checks.name: manifest-href-valid-url
checks.description: Manifest item href must be a valid URL with proper percent-encoding

checks.name: manifest-href-no-path-traversal
checks.description: Manifest item href must not use parent directory references to escape the container

checks.name: no-duplicate-zip-entries
checks.description: The container must not contain duplicate file entries (case-insensitive on some systems)

checks.name: manifest-href-no-absolute-path
checks.description: Manifest item href must not use absolute paths that leak outside the container

checks.name: nav-toc-requires-ol
checks.description: The TOC nav element must contain an ordered list (ol) as its content model

checks.name: nav-hidden-attribute
checks.description: The hidden attribute on nav elements is allowed but may affect reading system behavior
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag hidden attribute on nav element

checks.name: nav-landmarks-valid-types
checks.description: Landmark navigation entries should use valid epub:type values from the structural semantics vocabulary
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag unknown epub:type values on landmark nav entries

checks.name: nav-well-formed-xhtml
checks.description: The navigation document must be well-formed XHTML

checks.name: epub-type-valid
checks.description: The epub:type attribute should use valid values from the structural semantics vocabulary
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag unknown epub:type values

checks.name: unique-ids
checks.description: All id attributes within a content document must be unique

checks.name: no-undeclared-entities
checks.description: Content documents must not reference undeclared XML entities

checks.name: single-body-element
checks.description: Content documents must contain exactly one body element

checks.name: html-root-element
checks.description: Content documents must have an html element as the root element

checks.name: no-processing-instructions
checks.description: Processing instructions (like xml-stylesheet) should not be used in EPUB content documents
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag xml-stylesheet processing instructions in content documents

checks.name: no-position-absolute
checks.description: Position:absolute in content documents may cause rendering issues in reading systems
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag position:absolute in inline styles

checks.name: referenced-objects-exist
checks.description: Resources referenced by object elements must exist in the container

checks.name: no-parent-directory-links
checks.description: Content document links must not use parent directory references that escape the container

checks.name: css-well-formed
checks.description: CSS stylesheets must be syntactically valid

checks.name: css-valid-properties
checks.description: CSS stylesheets should use valid CSS property names
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag unknown CSS property names

checks.name: css-font-face-has-src
checks.description: @font-face rules must include a src descriptor
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag @font-face rules missing a src descriptor

checks.name: css-no-remote-font-src
checks.description: @font-face src must not reference remote resources without proper declaration

checks.name: css-no-import
checks.description: @import rules should not be used in EPUB CSS stylesheets
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag @import rules in CSS

checks.name: css-font-src-exists
checks.description: Font files referenced in @font-face src must exist in the container

checks.name: css-background-image-exists
checks.description: Image files referenced in CSS background-image must exist in the container

checks.name: css-resource-in-manifest
checks.description: Resources referenced in CSS must be declared in the OPF manifest

checks.name: rendition-layout-valid
checks.description: The rendition:layout property value must be 'reflowable' or 'pre-paginated'

checks.name: rendition-orientation-valid
checks.description: The rendition:orientation property value must be 'landscape', 'portrait', or 'auto'

checks.name: rendition-spread-valid
checks.description: The rendition:spread property value must be 'none', 'landscape', 'portrait', 'both', or 'auto'

checks.name: spine-layout-property-valid
checks.description: Spine itemref rendition:layout property must use valid values

checks.name: spine-spread-property-valid
checks.description: Spine itemref rendition:spread property must use valid values

checks.name: image-media-type-matches
checks.description: The declared media type for images must match the actual file content

checks.name: image-core-media-type
checks.description: Images should use EPUB core media types (JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG)
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag image/webp as non-core media type

checks.name: image-not-corrupted
checks.description: Image files must not be corrupted and must have valid file headers

checks.name: foreign-resource-has-fallback
checks.description: Foreign resources (non-core media types) must have a fallback declared in the manifest

checks.name: audio-foreign-resource-fallback
checks.description: Audio resources with non-core media types must have a fallback

checks.name: xml-utf8-encoding
checks.description: XML documents in EPUB must be encoded in UTF-8

checks.name: html-utf8-encoding
checks.description: HTML documents in EPUB must be encoded in UTF-8, not UTF-16

checks.name: metainf-encryption-valid
checks.description: If META-INF/encryption.xml exists, it must be valid

checks.name: container-all-rootfiles-exist
checks.description: All rootfile elements in container.xml must point to existing OPF files

checks.name: container-rootfile-mediatype-correct
checks.description: Container rootfile must declare media-type application/oebps-package+xml

checks.name: epub2-no-nav-property
checks.description: EPUB 2 manifest items must not use the properties attribute (EPUB 3 only feature)

checks.name: epub2-no-dcterms-modified
checks.description: EPUB 2 metadata must not use EPUB 3 meta property syntax

checks.name: epub2-ncx-navpoint-has-content
checks.description: NCX navPoint elements must contain a content element with src attribute

checks.name: epub2-ncx-content-src-exists
checks.description: NCX navPoint content src must reference an existing file in the container

checks.name: epub2-guide-reference-exists
checks.description: EPUB 2 guide reference elements must point to files declared in the manifest

checks.name: epub2-ncx-uid-matches-opf
checks.description: The NCX dtb:uid must match the dc:identifier in the OPF

checks.name: epub2-ncx-unique-ids
checks.description: NCX navPoint id attributes must be unique

checks.name: page-progression-direction-valid
checks.description: The spine page-progression-direction attribute must be ltr, rtl, or default

checks.name: dc-date-valid-format
checks.description: The dc:date value should follow W3CDTF date format

checks.name: meta-refines-target-exists
checks.description: The meta refines attribute must reference an existing element ID in the package document

checks.name: spine-linear-valid
checks.description: The spine itemref linear attribute must be 'yes' or 'no'

checks.name: epub3-guide-deprecated
checks.description: The guide element is deprecated in EPUB 3 and should not be used
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag guide element in EPUB 3 packages

checks.name: uuid-format-valid
checks.description: A dc:identifier using urn:uuid: scheme must contain a valid UUID

checks.name: spine-all-nonlinear
checks.description: The spine must contain at least one linear itemref

checks.name: rendition-flow-valid
checks.description: The rendition:flow property must be paginated, scrolled-doc, scrolled-continuous, or auto

checks.name: prefix-declaration-valid
checks.description: The package prefix attribute must use valid prefix mapping syntax

checks.name: media-overlay-ref-exists
checks.description: The media-overlay attribute must reference an existing manifest item of type application/smil+xml

checks.name: head-element-present
checks.description: XHTML content documents must have a head element

checks.name: no-embed-element
checks.description: The embed element references external resources that must exist in the container

checks.name: lang-xml-lang-match
checks.description: The lang and xml:lang attributes must have the same value when both are present

checks.name: video-poster-exists
checks.description: The video element poster attribute must reference an existing resource

checks.name: audio-src-exists
checks.description: The audio element src must reference an existing resource in the container

checks.name: svg-content-valid
checks.description: Inline SVG in content documents must be well-formed

checks.name: img-src-not-empty
checks.description: The img element src attribute must not be empty

checks.name: ssml-namespace-valid
checks.description: Custom attribute namespaces must not contain reserved SSML namespace strings

checks.name: style-element-valid
checks.description: CSS in inline style elements must be syntactically valid

checks.name: no-rdf-in-content
checks.description: RDF metadata elements should not be used in EPUB content documents
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag RDF metadata in content documents

checks.name: accessibility-metadata-present
checks.description: EPUB publications should include accessibility metadata (schema.org properties)
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing accessibility metadata without --profile option

checks.name: img-alt-text-present
checks.description: Image elements should have an alt attribute for accessibility
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag img elements missing alt attribute

checks.name: html-lang-present
checks.description: Content document html element should declare a language via lang or xml:lang
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing lang attribute on html element

checks.name: page-source-has-page-list
checks.description: When dc:source is present (indicating a print source), a page-list navigation should exist
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing page-list when dc:source is present

checks.name: accessmode-metadata
checks.description: EPUB should declare schema:accessMode metadata
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing schema:accessMode metadata

checks.name: access-sufficient-metadata
checks.description: EPUB should declare schema:accessModeSufficient metadata
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing schema:accessModeSufficient metadata

checks.name: accessibility-summary
checks.description: EPUB should declare schema:accessibilitySummary metadata
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing schema:accessibilitySummary metadata

checks.name: accessibility-feature
checks.description: EPUB should declare schema:accessibilityFeature metadata
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing schema:accessibilityFeature metadata

checks.name: accessibility-hazard
checks.description: EPUB should declare schema:accessibilityHazard metadata
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing schema:accessibilityHazard metadata

checks.name: landmarks-nav-present
checks.description: EPUB navigation document should include a landmarks nav element
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag missing landmarks navigation

checks.name: media-overlay-well-formed
checks.description: Media overlay SMIL documents must be well-formed XML

checks.name: media-overlay-audio-exists
checks.description: Audio files referenced in media overlay documents must exist in the EPUB

checks.name: media-overlay-text-ref-valid
checks.description: Text references in media overlay documents must point to existing fragment identifiers

checks.name: media-overlay-duration-required
checks.description: Media overlay items must have media:duration meta elements in the package document

checks.name: media-overlay-clip-time-valid
checks.description: Media overlay clipBegin and clipEnd attributes must use valid SMIL clock values

checks.name: media-overlay-valid-structure
checks.description: Media overlay body must contain par or seq elements in correct structure

checks.name: video-core-media-type
checks.description: Video resources should use core media types (video/mp4, video/webm)
checks.epubcheck_note: epubcheck 5.3.0 does not flag video/x-msvideo as non-core media type

checks.name: media-overlay-property-required
checks.description: Content documents with media-overlay attribute must reference a valid SMIL overlay
